description: The ultimate tool for steep and icy skin tracks. The high-traction nylon plush provides improved grip for those situations where regular skins won't. The Splitboard+ skins feature a camming tail connector that ensures the straight edge of your skin is always spot-on.18cm of adjustability for a perfect fit.Tail connectors now feature a cam for improved retention.Tip connectors are asymmetrical to provide the best hold on your board.Precut straight edge aligns with your board out of the box.Removable RipStrip makes pulling apart skins easier, and can be removed for added traction in case of adhesion contamination.PFC-free hydrophobic water treatment prevents ice clumping.Refined non-toxic adhesive is functional to -30°C.Trimming tool included for precise and easy skin fitting.
name: G3 Splitboard+ Grip Skins
